channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: API Mocking Is A Team Sport
item.description: To deliver the best possible API product, you need a process that lets all team members contribute their best.

item.description: The skills employers are looking for in 2025 reflect the rapidly evolving work environment driven by technology and social changes.
